thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Frank Moretti
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Frank Moretti

author: Frank Moretti
title: Frank Moretti
text: Very professional and thorough agent at Goway. However there were a few blemishes. Our first excursion in Melbourne was rescheduled due to the wrong meeting place put on our itinerary. Our hotel in Cairns reset the wifi code every day, gave us all 3 days of breakfast boxes on the second day and the front desk clerk wouldn't place a phone call for us until I told her that the clerk on the previous shift was happy to try a number. Lastly the hotel in Sydney was terrible. It was very tiny. Couldn't even walk around the bed. No place to put clothes and didn't give us the breakfast included on our itinerary. When we complained about the room size they said that the room dimensions were clearly disclosed on their website. The name of this hotel was the Tank Stream Hotel. These were the few negative things you should know for future Reccomendations.
